title: Tips and tricks for making Diwali Healthy
text:
Sandhya Gugnani is a practising Nutritionist and started her career in 1997 trained at Dietetics Deptt at Indraprastha Apollo Hospital, New Delhi. Started her carrier with multinational corporates like AlliedSignal, Honeywell, Hitachi Metals, at NCR for 9 years in customer services and as a Business Manager – South Asia. In the year 2006, she became a consultant with Ozone fitness clubs and also provided dietary counselling. Apart from her clinical practice, Sandhya also conducts workshops for Corporates, Schools and other organisations including World Health Organisation, GENPACT, COKE, Hitachi, CIENA, Hansa Events, Euro kids School, The Hope Hall Foundation School, Annanda Foundation to name a few. Certified as a Health & Wellness Coordinator with FSSAI.
